name: Running Food (Demo)
description:
Running Food is a casual and serious game that encourages children to reflect on healthy eating. This is my first game and I developed it when I was in college. This project was my final work and I launched a beta version in 2015. Since then, I haven't worked on this game anymore. 

So, recently I decided to bring it back, updating the game adding new stuff, solve bugs in the past and I hope you enjoy it =)

Any donation are welcome and appreciated!

Thank you for your support!
